languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт начинает говорить — слишком быстро и бегло для Толкователя, однако не для Маражая. Тот поворачивает голову и начинает следить за эльдаркой, словно змея за птицей. Рейнджер делает шаг. Еще один. В ее голосе появляются новые нотки — напевные, почти успокаивающие, а руки движутся в причудливом танце жестов, то и дело прикасаясь к камню душ на ее груди.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт начинает говорить — слишком быстро и бегло для Толкователя, однако не для Маражая. Тот поворачивает голову и начинает следить за эльдаркой, словно змея за птицей. Рейнджер делает шаг. Еще один. В ее голосе появляются новые нотки — напевные, почти успокаивающие, а руки движутся в причудливом танце жестов, то и дело прикасаясь к камню душ на ее груди.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet starts talking, too quickly for the Elucidator, but not for Marazhai. He turns his head and watches her like a snake watches a bird. Yrliet takes a step. Then another. You hear new inflections in her voice, melodious, almost calming. Her hands are moving in an elaborate dance of gestures as she keeps touching the spirit stone on her chest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se met à parler trop rapidement pour l'élucidateur, mais pas pour Marazhai. Ce dernier tourne la tête et l'observe, comme un serpent observant un oiseau. Yrliet avance d'un pas. Puis d'un autre. Vous devinez des inflexions nouvelles dans sa voix, qui se fait mélodieuse, presque apaisante. Ses mains sont entrées dans une danse élaborée, multipliant les gestes, mais revenant sans cesse à la pierre-esprit sur son torse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet starts talking, too quickly for the Elucidator, but not for Marazhai. He turns his head and watches her like a snake watches a bird. Yrliet takes a step. Then another. You hear new inflections in her voice, melodious, almost calming. Her hands are moving in an elaborate dance of gestures as she keeps touching the spirit stone on her chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se met à parler trop rapidement pour l'élucidateur, mais pas pour Marazhai. Ce dernier tourne la tête et l'observe, comme un serpent observant un oiseau. Yrliet avance d'un pas. Puis d'un autre. Vous devinez des inflexions nouvelles dans sa voix, qui se fait mélodieuse, presque apaisante. Ses mains sont entrées dans une danse élaborée, multipliant les gestes, mais revenant sans cesse à la pierre-esprit sur son torse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ユリエットが話し始める。エルシデイターにとっては早すぎるそれも、マラズハイにとってはそうではない。彼は首をかしげ、蛇が鳥を見るような目つきで彼女をジッと見ている。ユリエットが一歩踏み出す。そしてまた一歩。彼女の声にはこれまでにない抑揚があり、耳心地が良く、非常に穏やかだ。胸の魂縛石に触れている両手は、精巧に舞うように動いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet starts talking, too quickly for the Elucidator, but not for Marazhai. He turns his head and watches her like a snake watches a bird. Yrliet takes a step. Then another. You hear new inflections in her voice, melodious, almost calming. Her hands are moving in an elaborate dance of gestures as she keeps touching the spirit stone on her chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットが話し始める。エルシデイターにとっては早すぎるそれも、マラズハイにとってはそうではない。彼は首をかしげ、蛇が鳥を見るような目つきで彼女をジッと見ている。ユリエットが一歩踏み出す。そしてまた一歩。彼女の声にはこれまでにない抑揚があり、耳心地が良く、非常に穏やかだ。胸の魂縛石に触れている両手は、精巧に舞うように動いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特开了口，她的话对阐释器而言实在是太快了，但玛拉斋却全都听了进去。他转过头，看着她，仿佛毒蛇看着小鸟一样。伊莉耶特向旁边走了一步，随后又走了一步。你听到她悦耳的声音出现了新的变化，充满了平静的意味。她的双手一边触碰着胸前的灵魂石，一边以精妙的手势舞动着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet starts talking, too quickly for the Elucidator, but not for Marazhai. He turns his head and watches her like a snake watches a bird. Yrliet takes a step. Then another. You hear new inflections in her voice, melodious, almost calming. Her hands are moving in an elaborate dance of gestures as she keeps touching the spirit stone on her chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特开了口，她的话对阐释器而言实在是太快了，但玛拉斋却全都听了进去。他转过头，看着她，仿佛毒蛇看着小鸟一样。伊莉耶特向旁边走了一步，随后又走了一步。你听到她悦耳的声音出现了新的变化，充满了平静的意味。她的双手一边触碰着胸前的灵魂石，一边以精妙的手势舞动着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet beginnt zu sprechen, zu schnell für den Elucidator, aber nicht für Marazhai. Er dreht den Kopf und beobachtet sie, wie eine Schlange einen Vogel beobachtet. Yrliet macht einen Schritt vor. Und noch einen. Du hörst neue Töne in ihrer Stimme, melodisch, fast beruhigend. Ihre Hände führen einen aufwändigen Tanz von Gesten aus, immer wieder berührt sie dabei den Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet starts talking, too quickly for the Elucidator, but not for Marazhai. He turns his head and watches her like a snake watches a bird. Yrliet takes a step. Then another. You hear new inflections in her voice, melodious, almost calming. Her hands are moving in an elaborate dance of gestures as she keeps touching the spirit stone on her chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet beginnt zu sprechen, zu schnell für den Elucidator, aber nicht für Marazhai. Er dreht den Kopf und beobachtet sie, wie eine Schlange einen Vogel beobachtet. Yrliet macht einen Schritt vor. Und noch einen. Du hörst neue Töne in ihrer Stimme, melodisch, fast beruhigend. Ihre Hände führen einen aufwändigen Tanz von Gesten aus, immer wieder berührt sie dabei den Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet empieza a hablar; demasiado rápido para el dilucidador, pero no para Marazhai. El Drukhari vuelve la cabeza y la observa como una serpiente vigilaría a un pájaro. Yrliet da un paso. Luego otro. Oyes nuevas inflexiones en su voz, melodiosas, casi reconfortantes. Sus manos se mueven en una elaborada danza de gestos que la llevan constantemente a tocar la joya espiritual de su pecho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet starts talking, too quickly for the Elucidator, but not for Marazhai. He turns his head and watches her like a snake watches a bird. Yrliet takes a step. Then another. You hear new inflections in her voice, melodious, almost calming. Her hands are moving in an elaborate dance of gestures as she keeps touching the spirit stone on her chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet empieza a hablar; demasiado rápido para el dilucidador, pero no para Marazhai. El Drukhari vuelve la cabeza y la observa como una serpiente vigilaría a un pájaro. Yrliet da un paso. Luego otro. Oyes nuevas inflexiones en su voz, melodiosas, casi reconfortantes. Sus manos se mueven en una elaborada danza de gestos que la llevan constantemente a tocar la joya espiritual de su pecho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, Aydınlatıcı işleyemeyeceği bir hızda konuşmaya başlıyor. Marazhai ise söylediklerini anlıyor, başını çeviriyor ve kuş izleyen bir yılan misali gözlerini ona çeviriyor. Yrliet bir adım atıyor. Ardından bir adım daha. Ses tonunda melodik, hatta sakinleştirici değişimler duyuyorsun. Göğsündeki ruh taşına değdirip durduğu elleri, zarif bir dans ortaya koyacak şekilde hareket ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet starts talking, too quickly for the Elucidator, but not for Marazhai. He turns his head and watches her like a snake watches a bird. Yrliet takes a step. Then another. You hear new inflections in her voice, melodious, almost calming. Her hands are moving in an elaborate dance of gestures as she keeps touching the spirit stone on her chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, Aydınlatıcı için fazla hızlı bir şekilde konuşmaya başlıyor ama Marazhai söylediklerini anlıyor, başını çeviriyor ve onu bir kuşu izleyen bir yılan gibi izlemeye başlıyor. Yrliet bir adım atıyor. Ardından bir adım daha. Ses tonunda melodik, hatta sakinleştirici bazı değişimler duyuyorsun. Elleri zarif bir dans meydana getirecek şekilde hareket ediyor ve sürekli olarak göğsündeki ruh taşına dokunuyor.{/n}
